Title: Mother of the Bride with Peplum Detail

Colors: dark-rose, royal

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: C279-dark-rose-mother-of-the-bride-with-peplum-detail_p.jpg

----

Description: Elegant mother of the bride gown. A bateau neckline and bodice are appliqued with lace and there are sparkling jewels embedded to create a floral pattern. The floor length chiffon skirt trains at the bottom. The bodice is belted with a satin sash and features a delicate peplum.
